summary: Nathan Nowack has sent an email with an intriguing offer. The subject indicates urgency or an attempt to capture attention. The email snippet suggests a proposal to build LLM development tools in exchange for a substantial financial reward. This could be a significant opportunity worth considering.

events.subject: STOP wait im a real person
